description: 1.8.1 (L1) Ensure 'Blocks external extensions from being installed' is set to 'Enabled'
info:
This policy setting determines whether external extensions (an extension that is not installed from the Chrome Web Store) can be installed.

The recommended state for this setting is: Enabled

Allowing users to install extensions from other locations (not the Chrome Web Store) can lead to malicious extensions being installed.
solution:
"To establish the recommended configuration via Group Policy, set the following UI path to Enabled :

Computer Configuration\Polices\Administrative Templates\Microsoft Edge\Extensions\Blocks external extensions from being installed
Impact: User will only be allowed to install extension for the Chrome web store."
